Build-Depends: automake, cmake, debhelper-compat (= 13), intltool, libass-dev, libavcodec-dev (>= 7:6.1), libavfilter-dev (>= 7:6.1), libavformat-dev (>= 7:6.1), libavutil-dev (>= 7:6.1), libbluray-dev, libbz2-dev, libdrm-dev [amd64], libdvdnav-dev, libdvdread-dev, libffmpeg-nvenc-dev [amd64 arm64 i386], libfontconfig-dev, libfreetype-dev, libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-dev, libgstreamer1.0-dev, libgtk-3-dev, libgudev-1.0-dev [linux-any], libjansson-dev, liblzma-dev, libmp3lame-dev, libmpeg2-4-dev, libogg-dev, libopus-dev, libspeex-dev, libsvtav1enc-dev, libswresample-dev, libswscale-dev, libtheora-dev, libturbojpeg0-dev, libva-dev [amd64], libvorbis-dev, libvpl-dev [amd64], libvpx-dev, libx264-dev, libx265-dev, libxml2-dev, meson, nasm, ninja-build, python3, yasm
Package-List: handbrake deb graphics optional arch=any handbrake-cli deb graphics optional arch=any
